pageTitle: Uses of Interface org.apache.camel.SuspendableService (Camel :: Core 2.15.0 API)
title: Classes in org.apache.camel.component.validator that implement SuspendableService
textBeforeTable: Uses of SuspendableService in org.apache.camel.builder.xml Service which has all the lifecycle events and offers details about its current state. A StatefulService interface  Interface used to represent the context used to configure routes and the policies to use during message exchanges between endpoints.
